description: '''Lowercase''' is an extreme form of [[ambient music|ambient]] [[Minimalist music|minimalism]] in which very quiet sounds are amplified to extreme levels. Minimal artist [[Steve Roden]] popularized the movement with an album entitled ''[[Forms of Paper]]'', in which he made recordings of himself handling paper in various ways. These recordings were commissioned by the [[Hollywood, Los Angeles|Hollywood]] branch of the [[Los Angeles Public Library]].
